path: PDF Library/Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/Trio/CR 31 32 3rd Floor GPO.docx
text: In GPO on the third floor, the thin clients for the virtual trios are located under the desks. The labels match up to the USB ports for the keyboard and mouse on the rack on top of the desk. If the Trio crashes and exits to the thin client, you may not be able to reconnect to anything and get a communication error. Power cycle the thin client to restore the connection. It should be connecting to vdi.vprod.io
